definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out

sentences.english: Out of control, Bonasera leaned forward toward the aisle and shouted hoarsely.
sentences.chinese: 失去了控制，勃納瑟拉向過道前傾，嘶啞地吼道。

sentences.english: Armhole Balance This allows a set-in-sleeve to hang slightly forward and follow the curvature of the arm.
sentences.chinese: 即裝袖後，袖子應稍微前傾，以符合手臂的形狀。

sentences.english: You should not be tilted sideways, backward, or forwards.
sentences.chinese: 你不能斜傾，後仰或前傾。

sentences.english: But he did not see. She leaned over him.
sentences.chinese: 他沒看見，她前傾的身體擋住了他。

sentences.english: Do that again. Get those feet good! Shaft forward.
sentences.chinese: 再來一遍，雙腳站好，杆身前傾。

sentences.english: Too much forward lean reduces the efficiency of the legs and can place strain on the hamstrings.
sentences.chinese: 過度前傾可以降低雙腿的效率，造成腿筋緊張。

sentences.english: Front-tipping arc door is closer to your life while elegant radian reflect its fair shape.
sentences.chinese: 前傾式圓弧門體倍感親切，優雅弧度盡顯流暢之美。

sentences.english: A common error is to inadvertently insert the cup in too much anteversion.
sentences.chinese: 一個常見的失誤是不經意地使臼杯過於前傾。

sentences.english: The ship is tipping forward a little bit. You can pump some water or oil to adjust the draft.
sentences.chinese: 船稍微有點前傾，你可以抽一些水或油來調整喫水。

sentences.english: If they are leaningforward, you should be doing the same.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們俯身前傾，你也要同樣做。

sentences.english: The psoas and pectineus tilt the hip slightly forward.
sentences.chinese: 腰肌和恥骨肌使骨盆輕微前傾。

sentences.english: Please face the wall, separate your legs , place your hands on the wall and lean forward.
sentences.chinese: 請你面對牆，兩腿分開，雙手扶牆，身體前傾。

sentences.english: With head tilted and shoulders bent forward, he leaned on his trusty cane with each unhurried step.
sentences.chinese: 他歪着頭，肩膀前傾，拄着柺杖，步伐不緊不慢。

sentences.english: The next stroke, the upper body can not forward, not protruding buttocks.
sentences.chinese: 下捋時，上體不可前傾，臀部不要凸出。

sentences.english: From that position, you can execute a straight lead-arm strike to the jaw as you lean forward.
sentences.chinese: 從這個姿勢，你可以在身體前傾的同時前手直擊下頜。

sentences.english: Avoid the temptation to lean forward and take the weight off your legs; leaning forward will result in camera shake.
sentences.chinese: 一定要避免身體前傾，否則會引起相機抖動。

definition: to stick up/to point sth up
perfectly round/(fig.) accommodating/considerate/smooth (way of doing things)
to twitch/to throb/a spasm/to extract and use
